attributes.action: Lower the recommended age for a cervical smear test to 18.
attributes.additional_details: 18 is a good age as the body has almost finished growing.
attributes.background: The recommended age to conduct a smear test to prevent cervical cancer is currently 25 years old. In some tragic cases, this is too late in life and the cancer may have already spread. My aim is to get as many signatures in, and get the age lowered.
